GSD36brhaspiu:48: aduṣṭās te tu yad brūyuḥ Brh_1,7.51a
GSD36brhaspiu:49: aduṣṭās te tu yad brūyuḥ Brh_1,19.39a
GSD36brhaspiu:137: anyathā cet krayo yaḥ syād Brh_1,18.14c
GSD36brhaspiu:545: ṛṇaṃ damaṃ ca dāpyaḥ syāt Brh_1,5.45c
GSD36brhaspiu:573: ṛṇī ca na labhet bandhaṃ Brh_1,10.126c
GSD36brhaspiu:574: ṛṇī ca na labhed bandhaṃ Brh_1,10.65c
GSD36brhaspiu:645: evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ sa yad brūyāt Brh_1,1.146a
GSD36brhaspiu:790: kiṃ kāryaṃ kā ca te pīḍā Brh_1,1.145c
GSD36brhaspiu:857: kūpaṃ taḍākaṃ gṛham unnataṃ ca Brh_1,18.18c
GSD36brhaspiu:940: krūrā lubdhāś ca ye narāḥ Brh_1,26.142b
GSD36brhaspiu:945: kretre ca vikretur idaṃ vadanti Brh_1,18.18d
GSD36brhaspiu:1112: grāmo deśaś ca yat kuryān Brh_1,6.15a
GSD36brhaspiu:1340: tatra tv idam upekṣāṃ vā Brh_1,10.30a
GSD36brhaspiu:1367: tat suto vā dhanaṃ tāsāṃ Brh_1,26.33c
GSD36brhaspiu:1467: tad eva syād gṛhe gṛhe Brh_1,26.5d
GSD36brhaspiu:1516: tasmād arthaṃ ca rājyaṃ ca Brh_1,1.53c
GSD36brhaspiu:1525: tasya kāryaṃ na śodhyaṃ tu Brh_1,5.29c
GSD36brhaspiu:1563: tasyām eva tu yo bhuktau Brh_1,7.18a
GSD36brhaspiu:1608: tṛṇaṃ vā yadi vā kāṣṭhaṃ Brh_1,22.25a
GSD36brhaspiu:1629: te pṛṣṭās tu yathā brūyuḥ Brh_1,19.14a
GSD36brhaspiu:1637: teṣāṃ nṛpaḥ pramāṇ aṃ syāt Brh_1,1.105c
GSD36brhaspiu:1643: teṣāṃ sidhyati tan na tu Brh_1,7.46d
GSD36brhaspiu:1675: tribhir eva tu yā bhuktā Brh_1,7.62a
GSD36brhaspiu:1685: triṃśat samā tu yā bhuktā Brh_1,7.36c
GSD36brhaspiu:1722: dattaṃ mātrā ca yad bhavet Brh_1,26.46b
GSD36brhaspiu:1986: dvau trayaḥ pañca vā kāryāḥ Brh_1,17.10a
GSD36brhaspiu:2096: na kuryān na ca kārayet Brh_1,19.54b
GSD36brhaspiu:2097: na kurvanti ca bhṛtyāś cet Brh_1,1.2c
GSD36brhaspiu:2098: na kenacit kṛto yas tu Brh_1,2.9a
GSD36brhaspiu:2104: na ca bhrātā na ca pitā Brh_1,1.152a
GSD36brhaspiu:2123: na dagdhaś cec chuddhim iyād Brh_1,8.80e
GSD36brhaspiu:2125: na dadyād uttaraṃ tu yaḥ Brh_1,2.4b
GSD36brhaspiu:2126: na dadyād uttaraṃ tu yaḥ Brh_1,3.7b
GSD36brhaspiu:2131: na dātavyā damaṃ kva cit Brh_1,9.18d
GSD36brhaspiu:2133: na dānaṃ na ca vikrayaḥ Brh_1,26.38d
GSD36brhaspiu:2135: na divyaṃ na ca lekhakam Brh_1,4.18d
GSD36brhaspiu:2136: na divyaṃ na ca sākṣiṇaḥ Brh_1,6.18d
GSD36brhaspiu:2143: na deyaṃ tv aṣṭadhā smṛtam Brh_1,14.2d
GSD36brhaspiu:2145: na niḥsravati yat tat syād Brh_1,10.36a
GSD36brhaspiu:2152: na pṛcched āgamāṃ kva cit Brh_1,7.54d
GSD36brhaspiu:2158: na bhuṅkte yaḥ svam ādhānaṃ Brh_1,10.53a
GSD36brhaspiu:2165: na yācate ca yaḥ kaścil Brh_1,13.25c
GSD36brhaspiu:2178: na lekhayati yas tv evaṃ Brh_1,2.44c
GSD36brhaspiu:2179: na lekhyaṃ na ca sākṣiṇaḥ Brh_1,7.21d
GSD36brhaspiu:2184: nava sapta ca pañca syuś Brh_1,5.1a
GSD36brhaspiu:2194: na sa tal labdhum arhati Brh_1,7.40d
GSD36brhaspiu:2196: na sa lābho bhavet punaḥ Brh_1,10.40b
GSD36brhaspiu:2197: na saṃtoṣaṃ gatas tu yaḥ Brh_1,9.23b
GSD36brhaspiu:2199: na sākṣī na ca bhuktayaḥ Brh_1,1.104b
GSD36brhaspiu:2204: na syād divyaṃ na sākṣiṇaḥ Brh_1,4.12d
GSD36brhaspiu:2205: na syur yatra ca sākṣiṇaḥ Brh_1,26.143d
GSD36brhaspiu:2308: niścetuṃ ye na śakyāḥ syur Brh_1,1.105a
GSD36brhaspiu:2539: pitrā bhuktaṃ tu yad dravyaṃ Brh_1,7.61a
GSD36brhaspiu:2573: putre tu śrāvitā ye syuḥ Brh_1,5.41c
GSD36brhaspiu:2611: puṣpaṃ vā yadi vā phalam Brh_1,22.25b
GSD36brhaspiu:2644: pūrvaṃ kṛtā kriyā yā tu Brh_1,10.57a
GSD36brhaspiu:2785: pradadyāt tv eva piṇḍaṃ vā Brh_1,26.103a
GSD36brhaspiu:3031: bhartrā pitrā sutair na strī Brh_1,25.9a
GSD36brhaspiu:3063: bhuktir eva tu gurvo syān Brh_1,7.21c
GSD36brhaspiu:3078: bhuktyā prāptaṃ tu tasya tat Brh_1,7.61d
GSD36brhaspiu:3087: bhūmiṃ dattvā yas tu patraṃ Brh_1,6.12a
GSD36brhaspiu:3123: bhogaṃ kāmaṃ ca nāma ca Brh_1,19.28b
GSD36brhaspiu:3125: bhogāt tatra na siddhiḥ syād Brh_1,7.63c
GSD36brhaspiu:3315: mohād vā yadi vā śāṭhyād Brh_1,2.17a
GSD36brhaspiu:3336: yat kiñ cit kurute naraḥ Brh_1,7.7b
GSD36brhaspiu:3337: yat tad grāhyaṃ tad ucyate Brh_1,3.27d
GSD36brhaspiu:3339: yat tv evaṃ likhitaṃ patraṃ Brh_1,17.12c
GSD36brhaspiu:3343: yat praṇaṣṭaṃ bhṛtaṃ vā syān Brh_1,16.10c
GSD36brhaspiu:3351: yatra vipro na vidvān syāt Brh_1,1.79a
GSD36brhaspiu:3373: yathā dhane tathā rṇe ca Brh_1,26.57a
GSD36brhaspiu:3404: yad āsām auraso na syāt Brh_1,26.33a
GSD36brhaspiu:3414: yadi labdhaṃ bhavet kiñ cit Brh_1,6.50a
GSD36brhaspiu:3424: yad dravyaṃ tat svakaṃ deyam Brh_1,14.7c
GSD36brhaspiu:3431: yady apy eṣām pitā dadyān Brh_1,26.121c
GSD36brhaspiu:3442: yaś ca na prakṛtiṃ gataḥ Brh_1,1.122b
GSD36brhaspiu:3450: yas tu tān na vivādayet Brh_1,3.33b
GSD36brhaspiu:3454: yas tu svaśaktyā rakṣet tu Brh_1,13.13c
GSD36brhaspiu:3481: yaḥ kaś cit svayam āgataḥ Brh_1,5.12b
GSD36brhaspiu:3495: yā tasya bhaginī sā tu Brh_1,26.108a
GSD36brhaspiu:3501: yā na dogdhrī na garbhiṇī Brh_1,26.36b
GSD36brhaspiu:3545: yena svaṃ pitryam eva ca Brh_1,5.6b
GSD36brhaspiu:3556: ye samāḥ syus tu taiḥ sārdhaṃ Brh_1,13.27c
GSD36brhaspiu:3561: yo na vidvān na dhārmikaḥ Brh_1,26.36d
GSD36brhaspiu:3571: yo vā tām udvahed dhuram Brh_1,10.117d
GSD36brhaspiu:3737: lobhād bhayād vā yo rājā Brh_1,23.12a
GSD36brhaspiu:4277: sa eva tatra sākṣī syād Brh_1,5.16c
GSD36brhaspiu:4280: sa kāryaḥ syād balād api Brh_1,16.7b
GSD36brhaspiu:4292: sa cāpy artho na sidhyati Brh_1,10.101d
GSD36brhaspiu:4294: sa cen na kuryāt tatkarma Brh_1,16.7c
GSD36brhaspiu:4297: sa jayī syād anyathā tu Brh_1,5.44c
GSD36brhaspiu:4303: sa tasmai tad dhanaṃ dadyād Brh_1,12.14c
GSD36brhaspiu:4304: sa tasya dāsaḥ putraḥ strī Brh_1,10.123c
GSD36brhaspiu:4326: sa daṇḍyo na tv atikramī Brh_1,1.167d
GSD36brhaspiu:4450: samau kṛtvā tu tau kumbhe Brh_1,8.84a
GSD36brhaspiu:4465: sarvam eva tu dāpyaḥ syād Brh_1,3.15c
GSD36brhaspiu:4522: sa śuddhaḥ syād anyathā tu Brh_1,8.64c
GSD36brhaspiu:4523: sa śuddhaḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ Brh_1,8.65d
GSD36brhaspiu:4586: saṃmānamātraṃ prete pitari dadyuḥ śuśrūṣuś cet (?) // Brh_1,26.83 //
GSD36brhaspiu:4648: sākṣī tatra na daṇḍyaḥ syād Brh_1,5.54c
GSD36brhaspiu:4664: sā ca dattā tv adattā vā Brh_1,26.109a
GSD36brhaspiu:4955: hiṃsāṃ vā kurute kaś cid Brh_1,1.3a
